keys.string: Nothing much, just thinking about the Machine Learning Material. I went to Dr. Conrad’s office hours a few times, but I feel like the concepts are just out-of-reach.
Along from Conrad needing a new graphics card, not really.
Well, let me see what you’ve got so far.
You and Seth look at your homework.
Not bad, you seem to be on the right track.

Machine Learning can be hard, but just have faith in yourself and Conrad. That man once taught a Programming Languages class while recovering from surgery. Don’t worry, you’ll be fine. Just keep going to office hours, and here- give him this old graphics card I have laying around. Now go do your thing [NAME]!

ArrayOfString.string: [Player][Dialog]Nothing much, just thinking about the Machine Learning Material. I went to Dr. Conrad’s office hours a few times, but I feel like the concepts are just out-of-reach.
[Player][Dialog]Along from Conrad needing a new graphics card, not really.
[Seth][Dialog]Well, let me see what you’ve got so far.
[Narrator][Dialog]You and Seth look at your homework.
[Seth][Dialog]Not bad, you seem to be on the right track.

[Seth][Dialog]Machine Learning can be hard, but just have faith in yourself and Conrad. That man once taught a Programming Languages class while recovering from surgery. Don’t worry, you’ll be fine. Just keep going to office hours, and here- give him this old graphics card I have laying around. Now go do your thing [NAME]!
